name: PLASIM
tagline: The Circulation Models Planet Simulator (PlaSim) and PUMA
body:
### Climate components for Earth, Mars and Titan

***

* Modular 	- Problem oriented model configuration 
* Parallel 	- Runs on parallel machines and clusters 
* Scalable 	- Wide range of resolutions starting at T21 L5 
* Portable 	- Hardware independent code
* Interactive 	- Graphical two-way user interface
* Structured 	- Clear and rich commented source code (Fortran 90) 
* Compatible 	- supports MPI, GRIB, NetCDF, [PRISM] 
* Free 	        - All components are open source 
* Documented 	- Extensive Users's Guide and Reference Manual 
* Fast 	        - Simulate 500 years per day on a standard Linux-PC
* Postprocessing 	-The "Pumaburner" postprocessor (ECHAM compatible) 


### Authors and Contributors
Frank Lunkeit - Edilbert Kirk - Klaus Fraedrich - Valerio Lucarini

### Support or Contact
[Planet Simulator Forum](http://www.mi.uni-hamburg.de/Forum.5807.0.html)
